page.title: 08ARMTHORPE FARMING ATTITUDES
page.content: {LOSS OF LAND:}The builders take a lot of the land. The farmers feel that surveyors in Doncaster should take more time in choosing a place for building on.They aren't using the worst land first,instead they are using the best.They should expose the pit waste,instead of taking farmland. Farmers also complain about compulsory purchase of good land by the N.C.B. {WHAT THEY OWNED:}They owned a milk herd,pigs,chickens,also crops of green peas,oats,wheat,barley,potatoes, sugarbeet,mangolds,turnips and cabbages. {WHAT THEY OWN NOW:}Steers, 40 Suffolk ewes,a few rams.The crops are barley,wheat,peas,oil seed rape and a break crop. {TRESPASSERS:}Are not liked because the farmers don't trespass on other people's land so they don't think others should trespass on theirs.
